long_description: Easy to mount or dismount thanks to the sloping, step-through frame, our Novara Fiona women's bike uses a shock-absorbent fork to smooth out unexpected bumps along fun trails and urban streets. The low stand-over height makes it a cinch to quickly hop on or off the bike. Suspension fork provides 63mm of travel to smooth out rough roads; you can lock the suspension out when it isn't needed to increase versatility. Relaxed design places you fully upright so you can look around, steer and pedal comfortably. Flat bar puts your hands in a natural position to reduce strain. 27 smooth-shifting gears let you spin easily on most any terrain or grade. Tektro brakes and levers offer confident speed management. Freedom Ryder Sport tires and Weinmann rims provide a smooth-rolling ride for cruising efficiently along roads and bike lanes. Accommodates a rear rack and fenders front and back (not included), making the Fiona great for commuting or running errands. Specs on our Novara Fiona bike are subject to change.
